description: Tommy has been playing in the attic again, and luckily, we were around to capture Tommy in all his glory.There isn't much to say besides the fact that Tommy loves sneaking off to the attic to rub-one-out when no one's around. This time, Tommy was digging through some of his high school photos when he came across a picture of a girl who Tommy too the virginity of.Oh how he adores those good ol' times. It also got him rock hard thinking about that past experience, so he thought it'd be an awesome idea to get the cameras rolling and stroke himself to a creamy conclusion. And that's just what he did!Enjoy!
title: Past Pleasure Memory
